en-US.summary: Get all your City of Phoenix requests handled through voice.
examplePhrases: Alexa open Phoenix at your service
Alexa ask Phoenix at your service to start over
Alexa tell Phoenix at your service restart
en-US.name: Phoenix At Your Service
en-US.description:
Ask Phoenix at your service for help choosing your ideal career.

Alexa will provide an ideal career by asking a series of questions and giving you an answer.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Phoenix at your service" or "Alexa, open Phoenix at your service" to get started".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
